title: Pedestrian fatally struck in Prince George’s County
text:
Prince George’s County authorities said a pedestrian was struck and killed Tuesday morning in Mitchellville.

Police said the man was trying to cross Annapolis Road at Atwell Avenue around 5:50 a.m. when he was hit by an SUV.

He was pronounced dead at the scene, according to Prince George’s County police. The driver of the SUV stayed on the scene.

This story will be updated.

Read more:



A pedestrian was struck and killed in Mitchellville, Md. (Prince George's County police)

description: The incident happened at Annapolis Road and Atwell Avenue.
